backend/main.mo: Canister implementing visitor record storage, user profiles, access control, timestamped entries, admin login via password 9533, and sorted record retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented requirements to frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme file defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark mode variables for the UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing theme and React Query providers and rendering the VisitorTracker UI.
frontend/src/components/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin password dialog handling authentication via backend mutation and enabling admin mode on success.
frontend/src/components/VisitorForm.tsx: Form component using react-hook-form to submit validated visitor details to the backend and reset after submission.
frontend/src/components/VisitorTable.tsx: Scrollable table displaying visitor records with formatted timestamps, badges, and loading or empty states.
frontend/src/components/VisitorTracker.t: Main visitor tracking UI with admin login, visitor form, table display, and CSV/XLSX export actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMode.ts: Tracks admin mode using sessionStorage with simple login/logout toggles.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, adding, exporting visitor records and performing admin login via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/exportToCSV.ts: Generates and downloads a CSV file from visitor records with escaped values.
frontend/src/utils/exportToXLSX.ts: Dynamically imports SheetJS to generate and download an XLSX file of visitor records.
frontend/src/utils/formatTimestamp.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into humanâ€‘readable date strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing visitor-tracking app features, admin password flow, known issues, and pending feature requests.
